The Talent GTM Podcast

The Talent GTM Podcast is a reflection of our commitment to speaking with talented professionals in urban and rural communities across the US and Canada – beyond the traditional “tech hub” – on a range of topics spanning sales, entrepreneurship, and people management.

Hiring talent with non-traditional backgrounds for tech companies is evolving rapidly. Join Krissy and Josh as they discuss how companies can benefit from non-traditional hiring practices and how Axon is utilizing this approach.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Poppins||||||||” custom_margin=”-4vh||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”-2vh||2vh||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]Interview with Taylor Howard, Operations Manager at H&M in Los Angeles, covering the importance of employee feedback, why so many first time managers struggle here, and some tips to get more comfortable at providing it.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”1vh||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ make_equal=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”1 – Employee Experience: Interview with Gil Cohen” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”rgba(102,102,102,0.1)” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”7vw|5vw|4vw|5vw|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”8vw|5vw|6vw|5vw|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”15vw||15vw||true|true” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”margin: auto;” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Employee Experience: Interview with Gil Cohen” _builder_version=”4.18.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Staatliches||||||||” text_text_color=”#242855″ text_font_size=”33px” text_letter_spacing=”1px” text_line_height=”1.1em” link_text_color=”#242855″ custom_padding=”||2vh||false|false” link_option_url=”/resources/podcasts/employee-experience-interview-with-gil-cohen/” global_colors_info=”{}” link_text_color__hover=”#F5B15E” link_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” text_text_color__hover=”#F5B15E” text_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover”]

1. Employee Experience: Interview with Gil Cohen

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” text_font_size=”19px” custom_margin=”-4vh||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”-2vh||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Season 1, Episode 1 | July 15, 2020 | 34:24

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Poppins||||||||” custom_margin=”-4vh||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”-2vh||2vh||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Gil Cohen, our inaugural guest on Blueprint’s first podcast, talks to us about employee experience, why it matters and where it belongs in an organization.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”1vh||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered:
The Talent GTM Podcast The Talent GTM Podcast is a reflection of our commitment to speaking with talented professionals in urban and rural communities across the US and Canada – beyond the traditional “tech hub” – on a range of topics spanning sales, entrepreneurship, and people management.

Listen to […]
